knimeNode.name: Savitzky Golay Deconvolution
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs Savitzky Golay deconvolution on a collection of peak profiles.

fullDescription.intro: Performs deconvolution using the first and second derivative of the polynomial to determine the boundaries and maximum intensities of the individual components (peaks) of the mass trace.
fullDescription.option: Minimum peak width of the individual deconvoluted components in the time domain [number of scans]
Minimum intensity of the individual deconvoluted comopnents.
Minimum relative intensity of the second derivative [0-1].

ports.outPort: Table containing the deconvoluted peak data.
